subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 2012 Saints were bad, and the 2012 Falcons were quite good. In 2013, those roles have reversed, and the struggling Falcons seem to stand little chance to beat the Saints.
snippet: The 2012 Saints were bad, and the 2012 Falcons were quite good. In 2013, those roles have reversed, and the struggling Falcons seem to stand little chance to beat the Saints.
